```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Conditional-visibility helpers (fallback for older package versions)
if (!exists('show_when_open', mode = 'function')) {
  show_when_open  <- function(j) cat(paste0('<div class="viz-show-when" data-show-when=\'', j, '\'>\n'))
  show_when_close <- function()  cat('</div>\n')
}

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_small_48obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

### S2: Pie + sidebar + show_when


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_open('{"var":"education","op":"eq","val":"Graduate"}')
```

::: {.callout-note}
## Graduate filter active
You are filtering to Graduate education level.
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_close()
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_open('{"var":"education","op":"neq","val":"Graduate"}')
```

::: {.callout-tip}
## Non-graduate filter
Viewing a non-graduate education level.
:::

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: 'asis'
show_when_close()
```

  x_var = "region",

)

result
